Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring newly constructed multi-family residences to provide adequate space to store and sort designated recyclable material.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring newly constructed multi-family residences to provide adequate space to store and sort designated recyclable material.
